conversations: I may be able to assist! Please see possible solutions \n1)Cause:Battery may be defective \nSolution:Replace the battery.
I'm sorry, but i don't have a response to your statement. Please try another one

I may be able to assist! Please see possible solutions below
 1)Cause:Cable defective
 Solution:Check that the cable between the keypad board and main board is correctly connected.
 2)Cause:Keypad board failure
 Solution:Replace the keypad board.

I may be able to assist! Please see possible solutions below
 1)Cause:Cable defective
 Solution:1.1 Check if the cable between the display and main board and the backlight cable are correctly connected.
 1.2 Check that the cables and connectors are not damaged
 2)Cause:Main board defective
 Solution:Replace the main board.
 3)Cause:Display defective
 Solution:Replace the display.

I may be able to assist! Please see possible solutions below
 1)Cause:Main board error
 Solution:Replace the main board, or upgrade the main board with the upgrade software
 2)Cause:Cable defective
 Solution:Check if the cable between the display and main board and the backlight cable are correctly connected.

I may be able to assist. Please try the following-> 
 1)Cause:Module defective
 Solution:1.1 Check that the cable between the external converter board inside the module and the
 converter board is correctly connected.
 1.2 Replace the converter board.
 2)Cause:Main unit defective
 Solution:2.1 Check that the cable between the main board and power management board is correctly connected. 
 2.2 Replace the power management board.
 2.3 Replace the main board.

I may be able to assist. Please try the following-> 
 1)Cause:Cable defective inside the module
 Solution:Check the cables connecting the converter
 board and corresponding parameter module.
 2)Cause:Parameter module defective
 Solution:Replace the corresponding module.
 3)Cause:Converter board defective inside the module
 Solution:Replace corresponding converter board.
what device can i help you with today?

I may be able to assist! Please see possible solutions below
 1)Cause:AC mains not connected or battery too low
 Solution:Check that AC mains is properly connected to outlet or battery capacity is sufficient.
 2)Cause:cable may be defective
 Solution:2.1. Check that the cable between the keypad board and main board is correctly connected.
 2.2. Check that the cable between the power board and power management board is correctly connected.
2.3. Check that the cable between the main board and power management board is correctly connected.
 3)Cause:Power board may be defective
 Solution:Replace the power board.
 4)Cause:Power management board may be defective
 Solution:Replace the power management board.
 5)Cause:The main board failed
 Solution:Replace the main board.
